name: The big dig
description:
A short puzzlescript game about mining out as much gold as you can from the dirt. with that same gold being able to be used to dig (don't ask me why it just happens ok :P).

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=07456fe930005d421dabe42b54e51309

Source code:https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=07456fe930005d421dabe42b54e51309

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
